column1: #Text=[0192] The auto mode is invoked by opening the database with the additional command line option/cmd AUTO.
#Text=This has the effect of forcing the collection of data and stopping the display of on screen error messages.
#Text=Any errors encountered are logged into the zLogError table in the Configuration module and are available for later viewing.
#Text=[0194] This module is used for the editing of the data in the Data module prior the printing of daily reports.

#Text=The editing currently required is the assignment of downtimes (used to monitor turbine and farm maintenance performance) and filling of missing or erroneous wind-speeds (used to calculate expected energy).
#Text=The instructions for this process are located on the network in a document called "Editing Instruction.doc".
#Text=[0195] This process will be increasingly automated as time permits.
